title: Students, profs., and politicians fear disenfranchisement of voters of color this election
description: For Penn-affiliated politics aficionados, President Donald Trump and the COVID-19 pandemic exacerbate America's sordid history of voter disenfranchisement.
author: HADRIANA LOWENKRON

title: From Locust tabling to organizing Floridians: Penn students grind in Biden's final stretch
description: As the campaign reaches its final stretch, politically active students are grinding nonstop to help the former vice president emerge victorious in key battleground states like Pennsylvania and Florida next week.
author: Hannah Gross
